title: The Naughty Girl Workshop
desc:
Are you on Santa?s naughty list? 
 Would you like to be? 
 The Naughty Girl Workshop is designed to empower women to create maximum pleasure in our intimate relationships, utilizing tools from ancient Eastern traditions.? 
 The workshop?s foundation is based in yogic practice, and will include asana practice for opening the pelvis and pelvic floor, Kamasutra preparation, and opening the throat chakra.? Additionally, we will explore tantric yoga, acupressure, and shiatsu massage techniques for peak pleasure in intimacy. 
 This workshop is suitable for yogis of all experience and levels, and absolutely no experience is required. 
 The best gifts come from our body?give the gift of pleasure this holiday season with the Naughty Girl Workshop.
